text: Roberto Font (October 21, 1904 – June, 1981) was a Mexican film actor who settled and worked in Spain.Goble p.452 ==Selected filmography== * The Party Goes On (1948) * I'm Not Mata Hari (1949) * A Thief Has Arrived (1950) * Fog and Sun (1951) * Yankee Dudler (1973) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1904 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Mexican male film actors Category:Mexican emigrants to Spain Category:Male actors from San Luis Potosí Category:20th-century Mexican male actors
title: Roberto Font
